body.section:
Most applications have a need for an integrated full-text search to increase usability. For the java world there is an excelent solution called lucene. The only problem is that lucene is a little low level and leaves you with some typical problems like indexing binary file-formats.
This project is a solution for the gap:
mmm-search-parser provides a pluggable set of parsers for multiple file-formats with low memory consumption. The parsers are independent from the search technology and can also be used for other scenarios.
mmm-search-engine provides API and implementation for a consistent search&indexing solution that abstracts from lucene.
